channel.title: Tat Banerjee & Renee Dubé on Video Translator
channel.description: Recent content in Tat Banerjee & Renee Dubé on Video Translator

item.title: Happy Holidays from VideoTranslator!
item.description: What a year it’s been! From our launch in May we would not have believed we’d come so far in such a short amount of time. Thank You Thank you everyone for all your support! We want to wish you and yours a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. We hope you have a brilliant 2020! Everyone who engaged with us, others that offered feedback, and folks who made a purchasing decision - thank you very much.
